description.value: This snare forces air through several high-pitched, whistle-like pipes or reeds. The shrill noise can be heard clearly up to 2 miles away but is most intense near the snare's trigger. The snare deals @Damage[4d6[sonic]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|basic:true] save) to creatures within 10 feet; a creature that fails this save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 round (1 hour on a critical failure). The triggering creature is deafened for 1 minute on a failure, or 1 hour on a critical failure.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
